text: Illimani is a mountain in the Andes range, in Bolivia. It is the 17th highest mountain in the Andes. It lies near the cities of El Alto and La Paz at the eastern edge of the Altiplano. It is the second highest peak in Bolivia, after Nevado Sajama, and the eighteenth highest peak in South America. ==References== Category:Mountains of Bolivia Category:Andes
title: Illimani
